author: timbeiko
content:
With The Merge approaching, the "eth1" and "eth2" terminology isn't as appropriate anymore. As a small step towards moving to better terminology, we've started renaming channels in this discord and repos on the Github Ethereum org to use "execution layer" and "consensus layer" instead. 

You can find a list of the old/new names, and what's been done and still TODO here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/great-renaming
